metadata.Title: CVE-2012-5854 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in WeeChat 0.3.6 through 0.3.9 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash or hang) and possibly execute arbitrary code via crafted IRC colors that are not properly decoded.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5854` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

weechat - 0.3.9.1-1
weechat-core - 0.3.9.1-1
weechat-curses - 0.3.9.1-1
weechat-plugins - 0.3.9.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: weechat package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.9.1-1').
